data.title: The new way of Error Handling in .Net 8
data.desc: We all strive for smooth-running applications, and as you might recall, I previously discussed strategies to minimize exceptions altogether. However, even the most robust code encounters bumps in the road. That's where exception handling comes in.

data.title: Ways to Craft Custom Middleware in ASP.NET Core
data.desc: Middleware in ASP.NET Core empowers you to inject custom logic before or after processing an HTTP request. Youâ€™re likely already leveraging built-in middleware offered by the framework.
